pr_title: KAFKA-9410: Make groupId Optional in KafkaConsumer

timeline.message: KAFKA-9410: Make groupId Optional in KafkaConsumer

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps we can improve this. If the groupId is null, perhaps we can leave it out of the log context?
timeline.author: hachikuji

replies.bodyText: I admit that 'null' is not flattering, but I was preserving the current behavior.  Would you like something else?  We can improve this is a follow-up JIRA if you'd like to discuss.
replies.author: belugabehr

replies.bodyText: We can do it separately if you like.
replies.author: hachikuji
